DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study investigate efficacy bromfenac sodium ophthalmic solution 0.09 % treatment post-operative ocular inflammation subject undergo cataract extraction intraocular lens implantation . The secondary objective investigate safety tolerability .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Study Topical Bromfenac Versus Placebo Treat Ocular Inflammation After Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Cataract surgery Summed ocular inflammation score ( anterior chamber cell score plus flare score ) > /= 3 , 24 hour cataract extraction Agreed avoid disallow medication ( med ) throughout duration study Use need nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent ( NSAIDs ) , steroid , anticoagulant , specific med prohibit protocol Uncontrolled chronic ocular systemic disease , active corneal pathology scar note either eye ( except keratopathy , allow nonstudy eye ) Extraocular/intraocular inflammation either eye Clinically significant ( WHO CTC Grade 1 great ) liver function test
